name: imbued bandages
Description: these magically imbued bandages improve your natural Healing rate by 7.5% hp/h.

name: elixir
Description: this small elixir will instantly close most wounds.

name: recuperation balm
Description: this balm can regenerate even the ugliest old scars over time. +7.5% hp/h and unlocks the recuperation trait while it lasts.
